author: hollowstrawberry
description: Make the bot react along with everyone else. The bot owner may set regex patterns that the bot will react to with specific emojis.
install_msg:
‚è∫ __**Autoreact**__
:warning: *__WARNING:__** Some regex patterns have the possibility of running infinitely, freezing the entire bot. Please research catastrophic backtracking. Only the bot owner can use regex in this cog.
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load autoreact
2a. Start adding emojis to specific text with [p]autoreact add [emoji] [regex]
2b. Set a chance for the bot to copy any reactions with [p]coreact chance [percent]```
short: Make the bot react along with everyone else.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
